|population_est = }} Ferry Pass is a census-designated place (CDP) in Escambia County, Florida. It is a community in Pensacola. As of the 2020 United States Census, the population was 29,921. The University of West Florida, located in Ferry Pass. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Florida
